location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Justin Sheil to Major Samuel Hennell, Political Resident in Bushire

mods.abstract: Lieutenant Colonel Sheil, Envoy Plenipotentiary at the British Mission to the Court of Persia, in Tehran, to Major Samuel Hennell, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, regarding a dispute between two Bahrainis, which required the intervention of the Governor of Fars.
